name: Identifying Money Laundering Channels
description: Techniques for tracking illicit financial movements and identifying black-market funding sources.

cards.title: Understanding Money Laundering Techniques
cards.description: How transnational crime syndicates clean their money.
bulletpoints: Layering, structuring, and integration are key stages in laundering money.
Common laundering fronts: real estate, casinos, luxury goods, and cryptocurrency.
Detecting unusual financial patterns that indicate illicit activity.

cards.title: Offshore Banking and Tax Havens
cards.description: How criminals exploit offshore accounts and shell corporations.
bulletpoints: Understanding the role of tax havens in hiding illicit wealth.
Shell companies and their use in obfuscating financial trails.
Tracking financial transactions between known criminal-linked accounts.

cards.title: Cryptocurrency in Illicit Finance
cards.description: Analyzing how digital assets are used for money laundering.
bulletpoints: Tracing blockchain transactions to uncover criminal crypto flows.
Mixing services, tumblers, and privacy coins used for obfuscation.
Government responses and countermeasures against crypto-based laundering.
